name: Crazy VR Dance Party
description:
Do you want to dance together with cute girls, crazy characters or even spooky monsters?
Then Crazy VR Dance Party is for you!

Features:

  • Many different dance partners
  • Several different dance locations
  • Countless cool and sexy dance moves
  • Amazing electronic background music
  • Perfect game for lonely hours or just to kill some time
  • Awesome game to keep you fit
  • Unlimited hours of dancing
  • Achievements
